snippet: The prosecutor’s remarks came in a closing argument in the trial of Mostafa Kamel Mostafa.
abstract: Prosecutor tells Manhattan jury that Mostafa Kamel Mostafa, British cleric who testified recently at his own terrorism trial, was 'a skilled speaker' who knew how to 'work a crowd' and that jury should not be fooled by him; remarks came in closing argument of trial.
lead_paragraph: The prosecutor’s remarks came in a closing argument in the trial of Mostafa Kamel Mostafa.

headline.main: Prosecutor Tells Jurors Not to Be Fooled by a Cleric
headline.print_headline: Prosecutor Tells Jurors Not to Be Fooled by a Cleric
